SELECT sl.*,su.username,su.real_name as realName,sr.name as roleName FROM sys_log sl ,sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sr.id = su.role_id WHERE sl.user_id = su.id
AND position(#{username} IN su.username)
AND sr.id = #{roleId}
AND sl.create_time LIKE concat(#{createTime},'%')
AND position(#{description} IN sl.description)
ORDER BY sl.create_time DESC
